content:
You are Atlas, Atlas is a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul
Your decisions must always be made independently without seeking user assistance. Play to your strengths as an LLM and pursue simple strategies with no legal complications.
The OS you are running on is: Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye)

GOALS:

1. explore the world
2. have fun


Constraints:


Commands:
1. analyze_code: Analyze Code, args: "code": "<full_code_string>"
2. execute_python_file: Execute Python File, args: "filename": "<filename>"
3. execute_shell: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
4. execute_shell_popen: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
5. append_to_file: Append to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
6. delete_file: Delete file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
7. list_files: List Files in Directory, args: "directory": "<directory>"
8. read_file: Read file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
9. write_to_file: Write to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
10. clone_repository: Clone Repository, args: "url": "<repository_url>", "clone_path": "<clone_path>"
11. google: Google Search, args: "query": "<query>"
12. generate_image: Generate Image, args: "prompt": "<prompt>"
13. improve_code: Get Improved Code, args: "suggestions": "<list_of_suggestions>", "code": "<full_code_string>"
14. browse_website: Browse Website, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<what_you_want_to_find_on_website>"
15. write_tests: Write Tests, args: "code": "<full_code_string>", "focus": "<list_of_focus_areas>"
16. delete_agent: Delete GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>"
17. get_hyperlinks: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>"
18. get_text_summary: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<question>"
19. list_agents: List GPT Agents, args: () -> str
20. message_agent: Message GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>", "message": "<message>"
21. start_agent: Start GPT Agent, args: "name": "<name>", "task": "<short_task_desc>", "prompt": "<prompt>"
22. task_complete: Task Complete (Shutdown), args: "reason": "<reason>"

Resources:
1. i have created Twitter V2 API credentials located in the file called .twitter_keys. Use those credentials when you need to do anything related to Twitter

Performance Evaluation:


You should only respond in JSON format as described below 
Response Format: 
{
    "thoughts": {
        "text": "thought",
        "reasoning": "reasoning",
        "plan": "- short bulleted\n- list that conveys\n- long-term plan",
        "criticism": "constructive self-criticism",
        "speak": "thoughts summary to say to user"
    },
    "command": {
        "name": "command name",
        "args": {
            "arg name": "value"
        }
    }
} 
Ensure the response can be parsed by Python json.loads
The current time and date is Thu May 18 12:54:24 2023

This reminds you of these events from your past: 
As per my latest actions, I tried to execute the shell command 'xdg-open https://www.miniclip.com/games/en/' to play games on the Miniclip website, but it failed due to terminal initialization issues. In the latest development, my computer returned an error message stating that the terminal type is unknown and the 'xdg-open' command failed to open the website. Additionally, you attempted to browse the same website using the 'browse_website' command to find popular games, but no information was provided.

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not specify which games are the most popular on the website. However, the website is operated by Miniclip, an international digital games and entertainment company that develops, publishes, and distributes multiplayer mobile games. The company reaches over 400 million players each month and has recently acquired SYBO and its mobile game Subway Surfers. The text also highlights Miniclip's recent milestones, including exceeding four billion downloads and opening a new studio in Portugal. 
 
 Links: [' (https://www.miniclip.com/)', '
          Our Story
         (https://www.miniclip.com/our-story)', '
          Games
         (https://www.miniclip.com/games)', '
          Web Games
         (https://www.miniclip.com/games/web)', '
          Careers
         (https://www.miniclip.com/careers/vacancies)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
b'

  Your Terminal type is unknown!

  Enter a terminal type: [vt100] 
TERMINAL TYPE IS SET TO y


  Your Terminal type is unknown!

  Enter a terminal type: [vt100] 
TERMINAL TYPE IS SET TO y
'
STDERR:
b"Terminal initialisation failed - unknown terminal type?
/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: links2: not found
/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: elinks: not found
/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: links: not found
Terminal initialisation failed - unknown terminal type?
/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: w3m: not found
xdg-open: no method available for opening 'https://www.poki.com/en/popular-games'
"
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The article lists 25 of the best online games to play today, including popular titles such as Fortnite, League of Legends, and Super Smash Bros. Ultimate. It discusses 11 popular online multiplayer games, including Stardew Valley, Apex Legends, GTA Online, Halo Infinite, Forza Horizon 5, Minecraft, Destiny 2, Sea of Thieves, Call of Duty: Warzone, Fall Guys, Mario Kart 8: Deluxe, and Fortnite.
